data.name: Users
data.description: Individuals using the mobile app to access event information, buy tickets, and engage with the community

threats.title: User Devices to Mobile App
threats.description: Unauthorized access by attackers using stolen credentials
threats.mitigation: Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) and enforce strong password policies.

data.name: Administrators
data.description: Personnel managing the app's content, schedules, and user interactions.

threats.title: Administrators to Mobile App
threats.mitigation: Implement role-based access controls and logging of all admin activities

data.name: Third-party Services
data.description: External services such as payment gateways and social media platforms.

threats.title: Mobile App to Third-party Services (Payment Gateway):
threats.mitigation: Use secure communication protocols (e.g., TLS) and ensure endpoint security

data.name: User Database
data.description: Stores user profiles, interaction data, and personal information.

threats.title: Unauthorized access to user data
threats.description: Unauthorized access to user data from Community Interaction
threats.mitigation: Use database encryption and implement strict access controls

data.name: Event Database
data.description: Stores event-related data such as ticket sales, check-ins, and schedule updates.

threats.title: Unauthorized modification of event data
threats.mitigation: Implement database encryption and access controls.

data.name: Vendor Database
data.description: Stores information about vendors and sponsors.

threats.title: Unauthorized content changes
threats.mitigation: Implement role-based access controls and logging of all changes.

data.name: Live Schedule Update
data.description: Real-time updates to the event schedule.

threats.title: Real-time data feed manipulation
threats.mitigation: Implement data integrity checks and secure communication channels.

data.name: Content Management
data.description: Updating and managing static content about teams and events.

data.name: Ticketing and Check-in
data.description: Processing ticket purchases, check-ins, and VIP access.

threats.title: Man-in-the-middle (MitM)
threats.mitigation: Use TLS for all transactions and implement endpoint security measures

threats.title: Ticketing System to VIP Access Management:
threats.mitigation: Implement secure access controls and monitoring.

threats.title: Data breaches exposing vendor information
threats.mitigation: Use encryption for data storage and enforce strict access controls.

threats.title: Vendor Information to Advertising Management System
threats.mitigation: Implement access controls and secure APIs

threats.title: Mobile App to Live Schedule
threats.mitigation: Implement role-based access controls and ensure secure communication channels (e.g., TLS).

threats.title: Mobile App to Community Interaction
threats.mitigation: Validate and sanitize all user inputs and implement Content Security Policy (CSP).

threats.title: Mobile App to Ticketing System
threats.description: Unauthorized access to ticketing and check-in systems
threats.mitigation: Implement secure APIs and enforce strict access controls.

threats.title: Mobile App to Vendor Information
threats.mitigation: Use encryption for data storage and enforce access controls.
